name: John_Glenn
text:
John Glenn
John Glenn was an influential American figure of the 20th century.
In 1989, an archivist equated Meriwether Lewis' cultural impact to those of Glenn, Charles Lindbergh, and Neil Armstrong combined.
Behind the scenes
John Glenn (July 18, 1921 – December 8, 2016) was an astronaut who became the first American to orbit the Earth in 1962.
